file_content.text: End your slaughter. We will not harm you.
I have no quarrel with you. I just want to find the Sith Lord.
Tell me where Fulminiss went.
Gone.
Who are you?
You look like spirits.
Ancient Mystics of Voss. Bound to this shrine for eternity. Wisdom endures through us.
I'm trying to save Voss, and this is the thanks I get? Attacked in a place of healing?
I don't like being ambushed.
We did not do this. Fulminiss drove the living healers mad. They attacked each other. Then you.
We taught Fulminiss the healing ritual. He perverted it.
Corrupted, it rips open the mind. Violence and slaughter are unleashed.
None of this would have happened if one of your own Mystics wasn't working with the Sith.
Valen-Da is helping Fulminiss.
The Mystics are never wrong.
Fulminiss used this trick on his apprentices, even before he came here.
I've seen this before.
The healing ritual draws from many to heal one. Fulminiss learned this technique. His reach is farther now.
Can't you sense the darkness in Fulminiss? Couldn't you see he was going to use this knowledge against you?
Why did you teach him?
We were bound to help him. It was decreed by the Mystic. A Mystic is never wrong.
Valen-Da left a message. In the corner.
How come this holo won't activate?
Take it to Tala-Reh.
The sooner I find out what this says, the sooner I can stop Fulminiss.
I'll go now.
What's with all the clues? Is the Mystic playing some sort of game?
What is Valen-Da up to?
I'm trying to save your planet, remember? Can't you just tell me what's on the holo?
We're wasting time.
Our task is done.
